About me

A compassionate and dedicated Ayurvedic practitioner with a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery (BAMS). With a deep-rooted belief in natural healing and holistic wellness, combines ancient Ayurvedic wisdom with modern insights to treat the root cause of ailments, not just the symptoms. Specializing in general care, panchakarma, skin, digestion, lifestyle disorders that aims to restore balance in the body, mind, and spirit through personalized herbal treatments, diet counseling, and lifestyle modifications. With a focus on empathetic patient care, preventive healthcare, and sustainable wellness, Dr.Mitali envisions a healthier society through the timeless science of Ayurveda. Currently building a wellness space titled Healing Nest, where every individual is nurtured with care, calm, and clinical excellence.
